titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2646) to provide for the continuation of agricultural programs through fiscal year 2011.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-226, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2646 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 79.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 248.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/2/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 2646 (continuation of agricultural programs through FY 2011).
